result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven A Steffen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: STRAIGHT TIME - Defendant to report to the Waukesha County Jail by 5pm on 08/19/2022. 2 days credit.

Costs to be paid $50.00 a month commencing 10/01/2022 and each month thereafter or penalty of civil judgment for non-payment. 
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Restitution for Walgreens to be paid with the above mentioned payment plan.

1:47 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary Caitlin Brejcha in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Steven A Steffen in court.  Attorney J Andrew Herbers Jr. in court for Steven A Steffen. 

The Court conducts a plea colloquy with the Defendant.
The Defendant pleads guilty to Count 1.
The Court finds the Defendant guilty of Count 1
Count 2 is dismissed and read into Count 1.

The State gives its sentencing recommendation.
The Defense gives its sentencing recommendation.
The Defendant presents a statement.



The defendant was sentenced to the following:


**COUNT 1**


JAIL: 30 days - STRIGHT TIME. (CREDIT: 2 days)
Defendant to report to Waukesha Count Jail by 5:00 p.m. on August 19, 2022.


COSTS: $243.00;
DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00;
DR. GOD SURCHAGE: $10.00
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. .
RESTITUTION:  $32.98 to Walgreens;
   -Restitution to be paid before costs or fines.

Defendant to pay $50/month commencing October 01, 2022 and each month thereafter or civil judgment entered as penalty for non payment.
Effective August 1, 2022, this case is assigned to Branch 7 Judicial Vacancy, pursuant to 22-SO-04(67).
